meanings.sent1: The chooser picked the red apple from the tree.
meanings.sent2: My sister is the chooser of the movie we watch on Fridays.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had a special guest - the magical chooser of gifts.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of decisions, she stood out as the wise chooser of paths.
meanings.sent5: The chooser of destiny held the key to everyone's future.

meanings.definition: A person who selects or decides.
meanings.sent1: The chooser at the restaurant recommended the best dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: As the team captain, he was the main chooser for the upcoming game strategy.
meanings.sent3: The office party had a surprise guest - the mysterious chooser of decorations.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the ultimate chooser of winners in the annual contest.
meanings.sent5: The chooser of the path led the group through the maze of possibilities.
